content.question: In whose honor was this monument erected? How do the style and content of the monument reflect its culture's social and political values?

frqParts.text: In whose honor was this monument erected? How do the style and content of the monument reflect its culture's social and political values?

topic.text: 2.1: Cultural Contexts of Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Describe visual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. form.  b. style.  c. materials.  d. technique.  e. content.
